Reference version 0.1

All functions

add_goal_order

Adds goal order vector to determine in what order goals came

add_goal_positions

Adds goal positions to the restimote object

add_location

Add locations

get_goal_position

returns vector 2 of x and Y position of trial goal position

get_n_pointings

Gets number of times participant should point and pointed

get_start_position

returns vector 2 of x and Y position of trial goal position

get_trial_log

Gets position data inside trial

get_trial_point_orientation

Gets the orientation of pointing in particular trial

get_trial_point_times

Returns of times when people were pointing

get_trial_times

Colelcts start and end times for trial of particular id

load_restimote_companion_log

Opens restimote companion app in a given folder

load_restimote_log

Opens restimote log and attach�s it to the restimote object

plot_path_time.restimote

Plots path between two timepoints

plot_trial_path

plots a single trial path

plot_true_trial_path

Plots path as calculated by the true trial log, rather than by given timestamps

preprocess_companion_log

Preprocessses and returns RestimoteObject companion

preprocess_restimote_log

Preprocesses and returns restimote log

remove_companion_ids

Title

remove_pointing

Remove pointing mistakes from companion

remove_random_points

Title

remove_trials

Remove trial mistakes from companion

RestimoteObject

Creates list with parameters to be filled while processng

smooth_positions

Title

true_trial_log

Goes through the restimote log and defines trials not in respect to the companion log but in respect to when player achieved started at the start and when they reached given goal - times are incorrect, but path shoudl correspond
